title: #65 -  Why Streamers are Leaving Twitch for YouTube ft. DrLupo
itunes:title: #65 -  Why Streamers are Leaving Twitch for YouTube ft. DrLupo
description: On this remote episode of The CouRage and Nadeshot Show podcast, streamer DrLupo returns as a guest to explain why exactly he left Twitch for YouTube, his addiction to New World & Escape From Tarkhov, Halo Infinite, and more!
